verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great are you lord
The universe declares your majesty
Who can compare we searched all over
Ko se ni to da bi re

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Demons tremble at the mention of your name
Mountains crumble at the sound of your voice
Our battles are won by the power of Your mighty hand
We are strong cause we have a very big God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oluwa Oluwa e to bi e to bi o e to bi o e to bi o e to bi o
Oluwa Oluwa e to bi e to bi o e to bi o e to bi o e to bi o
Ko se ni ta le fi Ko se ni ta le fi sakawe re o e tobi o
Ko se ni ta le fi Ko se ni ta le fi sakawe re o e tobi o

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alagbada Ina
Oba Iyanu
Eledumare
Aterere kari aye
Olori aye
Moju bare
Ka bi yo osi

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oluwa oluwa e to bi e to bi o e to bi o e to bi o
Oluwa oluwa e to bi e to bi o e to bi o you are so big
Ko se ni ta le fi sakawe re o e tobi o no no no no nobody but you
Ko se ni ta le fi sakawe ko se ni ta le fi sakawe re o e tobi o ye eeeee
